version_description: Minor stability improvements

Updates for the 2016 Championship ...
- The application is now also on Apple Watch. Live scores, commentary and many other features on your wrist.
- Now supports iPhone 6S
- Bug fixes and interface improvements

* This application provides user generated content from social media to third parties. We are revising and can not be responsible for any content generated by the user you can view via this app. You understand and agree that you can see the content that might offend you or be inappropriate or misleading. We have no liability to you or any other person for such content. *

Bug fixes to resolve:
- intermittent crashes on the Apple Watch
- Video playback issues

New Features: 
- New globally available ‘Full Match Highlights’ video for each game
- New bonus points scoring included

Bug fixes to resolve:
- Bug fixes and UI improvements.

The Official NatWest 6 Nations App 2018
Minor enhancements
You can now follow matches on our matchcentre, featuring live commentary, in-match stats and exclusive video highlights.
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
Update iPad video player

-Quizzes and competitions
-The Guinness Six Nations table

- Personalised Teams Widgets allowing users to receive personalised news and notifications based on their favourite team.
- The addition of the Six Nations Twitter feed giving users the opportunity to stay up to date with the latest social updates.
Updated video tab displaying the latest Six Nations videos
- Match data now displaying info for this year's Championship
Bug fix for competition widget
Addition of Google Analytics Demographic Information
Updated fixtures for Six Nations 2020
Pick your Greatest XV from the first 20 years of the Six Nations era (2000-2019) and share it to show who makes your team!
With an updated video experience, follow the action as it happens. Additionally, make your team selections for the Guinness Six Nations Fantasy Rugby ahead of the first match.
Important updates to get us ready for the 2021 Guinness Six Nations, including design amends and push notifications.
Updates to get us ready for the 2021 Women's Six Nations tournament.
